scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run gulp build
scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run gulp deploy
scripts.e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run gulp e2e
scripts.publish: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run gulp publish
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run gulp serve
scripts.serve:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run gulp serve
scripts.serve:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run gulp serve
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run gulp test
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run gulp watch
scripts.watch:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run gulp watch
scripts.watch:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run gulp watch
scripts.watch:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run gulp watch
